title: International Conference on Sustainable Business Practices
description: A 3-day conference exploring innovative approaches to sustainability in modern business environments.
detailDescription: This conference will gather experts in the field of sustainability to discuss strategies and solutions for achieving ecological transition within business practices. Attendees will have opportunities to participate in discussions and networking sessions.

title: AI in Marketing Workshop
description: Hands-on workshop covering practical applications of artificial intelligence in digital marketing strategies.
detailDescription: This online workshop will provide participants with insights into how AI is transforming digital marketing strategies. The session will focus on real-world case studies and practical applications of AI technologies such as machine learning, data analysis, and automation tools.

title: International Conference on Sustainable Business Practices
description: A 3-day conference exploring innovative approaches to sustainability in modern business environments.
detailDescription: This conference will gather experts in the field of sustainability to discuss strategies and solutions for achieving ecological transition within business practices. Attendees will have opportunities to participate in discussions and networking sessions.

title: Digital Transformation in Finance Seminar
description: Intensive 1-week program for aspiring entrepreneurs with mentorship from industry leaders.
detailDescription: This immersive program will equip students with the essential skills and knowledge required to launch and grow successful startups. Industry leaders will mentor participants through real-life business challenges and provide valuable feedback.
